skills.title: IOT Development
skills.description: Proficient in IoT development, with a strong emphasis on integrating sensors, actuators, and microcontrollers into web and mobile applications.

skills.title: IOT Network
skills.description: Skilled in designing and implementing mesh networks and gateway architectures for scalable IoT deployments, ensuring reliable connectivity and data transmission in diverse environments.

skills.title: Cyber Security
skills.description: Proficient in implementing robust cybersecurity measures to protect IoT devices, networks, and data from potential threats and vulnerabilities.

skills.title: Mechine Learning
skills.description: Skilled in preprocessing and feature engineering of IoT data streams, including data cleaning, normalization, and dimensionality reduction, to enhance the quality and relevance of input data for machine learning models.

skills.title: Desktop Developer
skills.description: experience in developing responsive and user-friendly websites using Java in Netbeans

skills.title: Mobile Developer
skills.description: experience in developing mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms using frameworks for example React Native and Flutter

skills.title: Web Developer
skills.description: experience in developing responsive and user-friendly websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
